comments.text:
Of course the very key to this is that it has to be *dark chocolate* 
because all your other favorites like Milk Chocolate or Caramel or Cookies 
n' Creme chocolate is pretty much just full of sugar and has extremely low 
amounts of cacao (not cocoa) in it. Basically the more bitter the better 
and the earliest forms of *chocolate* was pretty much exactly this and 
merely just drunk instead of being solidified into our squares we like to 
bite on.﻿
